net.rim.blackberry.api.mail.event
Class MessageEvent

java.lang.Object
  net.rim.blackberry.api.mail.event.MailEvent
      net.rim.blackberry.api.mail.event.MessageEvent

public class MessageEvent
extends MailEvent

Indicates that a message has changed.

The system produces a message event when a message's header attributes (envelope) is updated, or when a message is opened, closed, created, forwarded or replied to in the device's Message application.

Note: It is not possible to intercept a message during transmission. Changes to the Message object indicated by this message event do not change data that has already been sent from the handheld. Changes are reflected in the message in the messages list, however, and the updated message can be retransmitted.

Category:
Signed: This element is only accessible by signed applications. If you intend to use this element, please visit http://www.blackberry.com/go/codesigning to obtain a set of code signing keys. Code signing is only required for applications running on BlackBerry smartphones; development on BlackBerry Smartphone Simulators can occur without code signing.
Since:
BlackBerry API 3.6.0
